articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: ECD Automotive Design Reports Early Traction From Third-Party Build Agreement. Initial Orders Validate Demand and Support Factory Utilization StrategyKISSIMMEE, Fla., Dec. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, Inc.
